scripts.publish:packages-sinbix: npx nx build packages-sinbix && cd dist/packages/packages/sinbix && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:packages-cli: npx nx build packages-cli && cd dist/packages/packages/cli && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:packages-core: npx nx build packages-core && cd dist/packages/packages/core && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:plugins-common: npx nx build plugins-common && cd dist/packages/plugins/common && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:plugins-node: npx nx build plugins-node && cd dist/packages/plugins/node && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:plugins-plugin: npx nx build plugins-plugin && cd dist/packages/plugins/plugin && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:packages-core && npm run publish:plugins-common && npm run publish:packages-cli && npm run publish:packages-sinbix && npm run publish:plugins-node && npm run publish:plugins-plugin
scripts.update:core: npm run publish:all && npm run install:core
